 
  step 1:
  
  gcloud artifacts repositories create vlt-video-duration-docker \
    --repository-format=docker \
    --location=us-central1
	
	
	
  step 2:
  
  gcloud builds submit --config cloudbuild.yaml .
  
  
  gcloud run deploy getvideodurationservice\
  --image us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/nine-quality-test/vlt-video-duration-docker/get-video-duration:v1.00 \
  --platform managed \
  --region us-central1 \
  --allow-unauthenticated \
  --memory 512Mi \
  --cpu 1
  
  
  step 3:	
	curl -X POST "https://getvideodurationservice-494586852359.us-central1.run.app/get-video-duration" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"url": "gs://raw_nine_files/vlt_video_extract/OTHERS/splitProcessOutput_vlt_video_extract_MAAT_Full_MAAT2023_10_A_HBB_360p_split2.mp4"}'
